name: Hidden & Dangerous 2: Courage Under Fire
description: Hidden & Dangerous 2 is a first and third person tactical shooter that builds upon the tremendous success of Hidden & Dangerous. You lead a small squad of Allied soldiers deep behind enemy lines, to carry out secret missions during World War II.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D Graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Multiplayer is not supported
